settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content: Organic Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera)(root), Organic Black Pepper (Piper nigrum)(fruit), pullulan capsules.

settings.heading: Directions
settings.content:
Add 1 scoop (5.59 g) to 12–14 fl oz (360–420 ml) of water, mix well, and drink immediately, 30 minutes to 1 hour before your meal. Drink an additional glass of water. You may use it up to 2 times a day. Do not take ColonBroom less than 2 hours before bedtime.

First-time users may experience some changes in bowel movement or feel bloated for the first few days while the body adjusts to the increased fiber intake. Start with 1 serving per day for a week, then increase to 2 servings per day. For best results, use the product 2 times per day and stay consistent.

settings.heading: Warning
settings.content:
Notice: ColonBroom should be consumed with at least one full glass of liquid. Taking psyllium husk without enough liquid may cause choking. Do not use this product if you have difficulty swallowing. 

Caution: Consult with your physician before use if pregnant/nurs- ing, have a digestive disorder, or if you are otherwise under medi- cal supervision or using prescription drugs. Not recommended for children. 

Allergy risk: Some individuals are allergic to inhaled or ingested psyllium husk. If you experience signs of an allergic reaction, such as hives, difficulty breathing, or swelling of any kind, stop taking the supplement and seek medical help.

settings.title: Prevents bloating
settings.text: The main ingredient in ColonBroom, psyllium husk, provides significant relief in abdominal pain, bloating, and excess gas when used regularly.

settings.title: Relieves constipation
settings.text: The essential fiber in ColonBroom is a viscous compound that benefits constipation and diarrhea. It absorbs the water in your digestive tract, making your stools firmer and slower to pass.

settings.title: Delicious flavor with low calories
settings.text: Enjoy the delightful taste of strawberries with the easy-to-use ColonBroom. This low-calorie fiber supplement is enhanced by the natural sweetness of stevia, ensuring a delicious experience.

settings.title: Improves digestive system
settings.text: ColonBroom provides your body with the recommended amount of daily fiber, which helps your gut operate smoothly and better absorb all the nutrients from food.

settings.title: Increase your fiber intake
settings.text: Not getting enough fiber daily may lead to increased stress and fatigue. Providing your body with missing nutrients can help you feel more energized.

settings.title: Free anti-bloating guide
settings.text: Get a limited-time present with every purchase. Boost your progress with a gut-friendly meal plan, an easy-to-follow exercise guide, and free access to the ColonBroom app!

settings.heading: A bottle full of benefits
How to use ColonBroom?

settings.text: Combine one scoop of powder (0.2 oz/ 5.7 g) with 8oz - 14oz Water (450ML) water. Mix well, and drink up! Drink an additional glass of water. Take up to 2 times daily 30 to 60 minutes before your meal. If you’re new to using ColonBroom, for the first 5 days start with 1 serving per day and after that, increase intake to 2 times per day.

settings.title: Thousands of Happy Clients
settings.subtitle: This could be you – check out these reviews from happy poopers around the world!

settings.title: Psyllium Husk.
settings.text: Psyllium husk powder is a superhero when it comes to supporting digestive health. Derived from the husks of Plantago ovata seeds, this source of dietary fiber can relieve constipation and help regulate bowel movements.  But it doesn't stop there. Psyllium husk powder can also work wonders for your cardiovascular system and blood sugar control when combined with a healthy diet and exercise.

settings.title: Stevia
settings.text: Stevia leaf extract is a natural sweetener derived from the leaves of the Stevia rebaudiana plant. It's a great alternative to sugar if you're trying to cut down on calories or sugar intake. And the best part? It won't spike your blood sugar.

settings.title: Amazing strawberry taste
settings.text: Get your reward and enjoy your SUGAR - FREE drink 2 times per day! Flavored with other natural flavors.

settings.title: These special components will help you feel lighter after using ColonBroom

settings.heading: What ingredients are used in ColonBroom?
settings.row_content:
ColonBroom is a high-fiber food supplement mainly consisting of dietary fiber, soluble fiber, and various minerals.

Here are some of ColonBroom’s main ingredients:

Psyllium husk

Psyllium husk is a fiber that works as a gentle bulk-forming laxative. It attracts water and becomes a viscous compound that benefits constipation, diarrhea, blood sugar, cholesterol, and weight loss.

Sodium

Sodium is a mineral found in salt and many other foods. Your body needs sodium for normal muscle and nerve functions. It also helps keep your body fluids in balance.

Stevia leaf extract

Stevia is a natural sweetener, often used as a safer and healthier sugar substitute. It has several health benefits, such as reduced calorie intake, blood sugar levels, and risk of cavities.

Citric acid

It’s naturally present in citric fruits, such as lemons and limes. It works as a naturally occurring antioxidant, which may help speed up your metabolism, fight infections, and boost your energy.

Natural flavoring

ColonBroom only uses natural flavoring without any artificial additives or sweeteners. It creates a delicate yet sweet taste without any added sugars.

settings.heading: Can ColonBroom cause bloating?
settings.row_content: Dietary fiber in ColonBroom is generally well-tolerated and safe. If you’re new to using ColonBroom you might feel a little bloating for the first days of using it. But don’t worry, your body needs to adjust to increased fiber intake.

settings.heading: Why is dietary fiber important?
settings.row_content: Dietary fiber is important for our digestive health and regular bowel movements. Fiber also helps you feel fuller for longer, can assist in preventing some diseases such as diabetes, heart disease, and bowel cancer.

settings.heading: Can I use ColonBroom while on intermittent fasting? Will it break my fast?
settings.row_content: Yes, you can totally use ColonBroom and follow intermittent fasting. And you’re completely safe – it will not break your fast. Unlike other macronutrients such as fats, proteins, or carbohydrates, which the body breaks down and absorbs, the Essential Fiber Complex isn’t digested by your body. Like tea or coffee, our product is recommended to use during a fasting window.

settings.heading: Can I use ColonBroom while on the keto diet?
settings.row_content: Yes, you can! ColonBroom, unlike other macronutrients such as fats, proteins, or carbohydrates, which the body breaks down and absorbs, isn’t digested by your body. Because dietary fiber has no macronutrients. Instead, it passes relatively intact through the stomach, small intestine, and colon. You don’t need to worry about additional carbohydrates; your body won’t absorb them and break them down into sugars.

settings.heading: When will I feel the effects of ColonBroom?
settings.row_content: It depends on individual metabolic response and varies; however, you’ll feel the changes in your bowel movements after approx. 24–72 hours.

settings.heading: How is ColonBroom different from other psyllium husk powder supplements?
settings.row_content:
Yes, there are similar products on the market, but we cannot guarantee their product quality or ingredients used. We can guarantee that Colon Broom uses only high-quality ingredients with high-quality assurance, ensuring that you get precisely what is written on the label.
And, not to brag, but our product is highly effective and doesn't take much time to take effect…*whispers* unlike some other products in the market...

settings.heading: How long should I take ColonBroom for?
settings.row_content: For the best results, you should take ColonBroom for 2-3 months. Don't worry; it goes fast!

settings.heading: Can I use ColonBroom while pregnant/nursing/trying to conceive?
settings.row_content:
Becoming a mom is a precious and long journey, but it's not always easy: mood swings, bloating, cramps, sensitivity to food (or cravings). You must balance your nutrition and make sure you're getting all of the recommended nutrients from your diet.
And ColonBroom can help with that. But, just to be safe, we highly recommend consulting with your doctor before using ColonBroom if you are pregnant/nursing/trying to conceive.

settings.heading: Can I take ColonBroom if I have IBS?
settings.row_content:
It depends on what type of IBS you have (no matter the type, IBS is a living hell). If you have IBS-C, we recommend increasing your soluble fiber intake, and ColonBroom is an excellent option.
But if you suffer from IBS-D, we don't recommend you using ColonBroom.
Again, just to be safe, if you have IBS, we recommend double-checking with your doctor before purchasing and ingesting any supplements.

settings.heading: Will I get the "runs" from ColonBroom?
settings.row_content:
You may experience some changes in bowel movements or a little bloating in the first few days, but don't worry. Your body needs a little time to adjust to the increased fiber intake.
The human body needs about 5-7 days to adapt to an increased amount of dietary fiber. After that - you won't be spending long hours sitting on the throne!

settings.heading: How long will it take to deliver my package?
settings.row_content: Our package delivery usually takes anywhere from 3 to 8 business days. You will receive an email about your order shipping status whenever it's ready.

settings.heading: Can I take CB with vitamins, and supplements such as BCAA, creatine, and pre-workout?
settings.row_content:
We recommend using Colon Broom a few hours before or after taking any medication. The recommendations for the use of Colon Broom apply to the supplements as well in order to assure the effectiveness of Colon Broom and to avoid any contraindications there might be concerning other supplementation.

We also recommend consulting with a doctor for an individual case assessment before using any supplementation or medication together with Colon Broom.

settings.heading: Is it suitable for diverticulitis?
settings.row_content:
Many studies show that eating a fiber-rich diet can help control diverticular symptoms. Fiber helps prevent constipation; it softens and adds bulk to stools, helping them pass more easily through the colon. It can also help decrease pressure in the colon and prevent flare-ups of diverticulitis.

However, foods high in fiber should be avoided during a flare-up for people who have diverticulitis, as this can provoke the symptoms.

If you have diverticulitis, firstly, we would highly recommend consulting with your doctor before taking ColonBroom.

settings.heading: Is it suitable for diabetes?
settings.row_content:
The addition of fiber supplements like ColonBroom to a traditional diet for persons with diabetes is safe, is well-tolerated, and improves glycemic and lipid control in men and women with diabetes.

Colon Broom should be taken at least 2 hours before or after any medications. Psyllium may reduce the absorption of several classes of medication.

While Colon Broom does not contain any of the top major allergens, this product may cause an allergic reaction in people sensitive to psyllium or products derived from strawberries.

In any case, before taking any new supplement we would highly recommend consulting with your doctor.

settings.heading: Is it suitable for the keto diet?
settings.row_content: Yes, you can use ColonBroom while doing keto, as it contains only fiber. Even though fiber is considered a carbohydrate, it is not broken down by the body into simple sugars, does not trigger an insulin response, and does not spike glucose levels.

settings.heading: Is it suitable for breastfeeding moms?
settings.row_content:
Psyllium husk (a type of fiber in ColonBroom) is considered safe for breastfeeding moms. Fiber, unlike other carbs, cannot be broken down into digestible sugar molecules and affect the quality of the milk in any way.

In any case, we always recommend consulting with a medical professional before purchasing supplements.

settings.heading: Is it suitable for colitis?
settings.row_content:
ColonBroom is a natural, plant-based dietary fiber complex that helps promote digestive health and relieves constipation. Unfortunately, foods high in fiber should be avoided during a flare-up for people who have mild ulcerative colitis, as this can provoke the symptoms.

We highly recommend consulting with your doctor before purchasing any supplement.

settings.heading: Can I take this with high blood pressure meds?
settings.row_content:
If you are taking medications for high blood pressure, we would recommend using Colon Broom a few hours before or after taking medication. This means, that if certain medication is used, it would be better to take Colon Broom at least 2 hours before or after taking the medicine.

We also recommend consulting with a doctor for an individual case assessment before using any medication together with Colon Broom.

settings.heading: Can I take this with high cholesterol meds?
settings.row_content:
If you are taking medications for high cholesterol, we would recommend using Colon Broom a few hours before or after taking medication. This means that if certain medication is used, it would be better to take Colon Broom at least 2 hours before or after taking the medicine.

We also recommend consulting with a doctor for an individual case assessment before using any medication together with Colon Broom.

settings.heading: Is it suitable for hypothyroidism?
settings.row_content:
Fiber is an important part of anyone's diet, but there are many aspects of a high-fiber diet that are of particular importance and benefit to those with thyroid disease. Fiber lowers your risk of cardiovascular concerns, helps with weight loss and management, aids your digestive system, helps control blood sugar levels, reduces your risk for diverticulitis.

Eating a diet high in fiber-rich foods and complementing with fiber supplements is a sure-fire way to provide your organism with much-needed fiber.

ColonBroom is a natural, plant-based dietary fiber complex that helps promote digestive health, benefits blood sugar, blood pressure, and weight loss.

Please note that fiber can affect medication absorption and significantly change your thyroid drug dosage requirements. Be sure that you are taking your thyroid medicine at least an hour before eating or taking any fiber supplement.

We sincerely recommend consulting with your doctor about whether ColonBroom supplements are suitable for you personally.

settings.heading: Why am I not losing weight?
settings.row_content:
We would like to point out that supplements are only a part (though important) of a healthy lifestyle. Healthy and balanced nutrition along with adequate physical activity makes the greatest impact on your weight. No supplement will replace good nutrition and no supplement will solve the problems caused by bad nutrition. No supplement alone is capable to make the weight disappear.

The key to weight loss is to eat whole grains, fruits, vegetables, and lean meats, reduce the calorie intake of high-fat foods, and keep moving. Depending on the individual, increasing protein may be beneficial (especially for those trying to not lose lean tissue), but the only way to lose weight is to make a lifestyle change. For most people, unless you alter your diet and get daily exercise, no supplement is going to have a big impact.

Getting at least 7-8 hours of sleep, eating a healthy balanced diet, consuming at least 1.5 L of water per day, and getting at least 150 min of moderate physical activity per week can greatly improve your gut health and weight loss. Try incorporating some of these healthy habits into your daily routine and see if you notice any positive changes in your wellbeing!

settings.heading: Can I take probiotics with CB?
settings.row_content:
ColonBroom contains the essential fiber and probiotics your digestive system needs for healthy function. Whether you’re facing chronic constipation or excessive bloating, ColonBroom is your go-to ticket for a healthy gut.

Using psyllium husk as a natural laxative, ColonBroom regulates stool movement.

The powerful natural ingredient serves as the dietary fiber and helps ColonBroom soak up water from your gut. We recommend drinking a sufficient amount of water if you want to use it.

You can take ColonBroom and probiotics together. Prebiotic fibers help feed and strengthen probiotic bacteria. Taking the two in combination can help make your probiotics more effective.

settings.heading: What are the return and refund policies?
settings.row_content:
If you do not like our product, you can return unopened bottles and get a refund of your initial order within 30 days. Unfortunately, refunds are not applicable for recurring subscriptions.

You can request a refund by emailing our team at hello@colonbroom.com. They’ll get back to you as soon as possible! In the email, please provide your name, order number, address, and the date the order was made. Afterward, we’ll send detailed return instructions to make the process as easy as possible. The refund shipping cost is 15 USD. For your convenience, it will be deducted from your refund amount.

settings.heading: What are the subscription cancellation policies?
settings.row_content:
If you decide to stop using the product, you can cancel your subscription at any time. If you are canceling your subscription prior to the first recurring charge, as you were offered the discounted price, you should pay the difference between the subscription and a one-time order in your self-service account. For more detailed information on our subscription policy, you can check out our terms and conditions at https://colonbroom.com/terms (Section 6.5.1.)

To access our platform, please follow these steps:If you already have an account, you can log in using this link: https://colonbroom.com/auth/login
If you haven’t signed up yet, you’ll need to create an account first here: https://colonbroom.com/auth/signup
Once the first recurring charge is processed, you can cancel your subscription anytime without compensating the price difference.

settings.title: Step 1
settings.text: Combine one scoop (0.2oz/5.7g) of powder with 14fl oz (360-420ml) of water. Mix well. To help dissolve the powder, place it in a glass first, then pour water over it.

settings.title: Step 2
settings.text: Drink immediately.

settings.title: Step 3
settings.text: Drink one more glass of water (250ml).

settings.title: Step 4
settings.text: Take your meal after 30–60 minutes.

settings.title: Step 5
settings.text: Have a nice day. Increase your physical activity. Exercise will help you feel better and more energetic and may help with digestive problems, gas, and constipation.

settings.title: Step 6
settings.text: Minimum 2 extra glasses of water per day (250ml)

settings.title: 1–7 days. Use ColonBroom 1 time per day.
